PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-12962013-11-28TC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (Standards 121, 206, 223 and 301.2)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (STANDARDS 121, 206, 223 AND 301.2) in order to (1) allow a wider range of flexible aerodynamic devices to be installed on trailers; (2) reinstate requirements that have expired; and (3) address issues raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0220 Publication Date: 2013-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
